comments.body:
Why do we need to implement `isNodeUntaintedWithNonblocking()`?
The function is only called from this function, and the above seems unnecessary wrapper.
We can change like
```
- func isNodeUntaintedWithNonblocking(node *v1.Node, nonblockingTaints string) bool {
+ func isNodeUntainted(node *v1.Node) bool {
+     nonblockingTaints  := ""
```

Make sense. Honestly, the changes in this PR make me uncomfortable. You know, lots of duplicated code across the codebase, especially with lots of TODO items. Maybe we should rethink about this one https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/42972f2a37c56b5f850086a7330b34ae6592f8ac/test/integration/framework/util.go#L17.

@gavinfish 
Many TODOs cannot be traced to their causes or historical background due to code changes, movements, and refactorings. Welcome to solve some of them, haha
see  https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/86763  https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/86756 
welcome

> Make sense. Honestly, the changes in this PR make me uncomfortable. You know, lots of duplicated code across the codebase, especially with lots of TODO items. Maybe we should rethink about this one 

I agree with this. Little duplication here and there is okay but this is a big one. Wondering if there's a cleaner way to do this.
@andrewsykim I have created #89292 to track this issue.
Seems this function is not exported anywhere, can we change it to getServerArchitecture?
This is a copy/paste from e2e framework. I think this may be a useful method for other tests in the future.
could you please add a //TODO comment about potential to be moved to another common test library.
